    plot_pathway_contribution_network

    plot_pathway_contribution_network.Rd

    plot the network based on pathway contribution

    Thanks to the SCOPfunctions package https://github.com/CBMR-Single-Cell-Omics-Platform/SCOPfunctions/blob/main/R/plot.R

    plot_pathway_contribution_network(
  mat_datExpr,
  vec_pathwaycontribution,
  vec_pathways_highlight = c(),
  n_max_pathways = 50,
  igraph_algorithm = "drl",
  fontface_labels = "bold.italic",
  color_edge = "#9D9D9D",
  fontSize_label_lg = 1,
  fontSize_legend_lg = 1,
  fontSize_legend_xlg = 1,
  edge_thickness = 1,
  do_plot = F,
  figurenames = NULL,
  width = 7,
  height = 7
)

    Arguments

    mat_datExpr

    data matrix for single cell data

    vec_pathwaycontribution

    vector of pathway contribution score from pagwas

    vec_pathways_highlight

    vector of pathway highlight from your choose.

    n_max_pathways

    number of max pathways for showing.

    igraph_algorithm

    defalt is drl,method for igragh,details see igraph packages.

    fontface_labels

    fontface for labels

    color_edge

    edge color.

    fontSize_label_lg

    fontSize for lg label

    fontSize_legend_lg

    fontSize for lg legend

    fontSize_legend_xlg

    fontSize for xlg legend

    edge_thickness

    thickness of edge

    do_plot

    Whether to plot, logical

    figurenames

    The filename and address of the output plot

    width

    figure width

    height

    figure height

    Examples

    plot_pathway_contribution_network(
mat_datExpr=pca_cell_df,
vec_pathwaycontribution=Pagwas$Pathway_block_heritability,
vec_pathways_highlight=names(sort(Pagwas$Pathway_block_heritability,decreasing = T)[1:5]),
n_max_pathways=20,
igraph_algorithm = "drl",
fontface_labels="bold.italic",
color_edge = "#9D9D9D",
fontSize_label_lg=4,
fontSize_legend_lg=4,
fontSize_legend_xlg=4,
edge_thickness = 1
)
#> Error in sort(vec_pathwaycontribution, decreasing = T): object 'Pagwas' not found
